title: Bollywood star named as new tourism ambassador (New Zealand Tourism Board)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Tourism Board ) Dynamic Bollywood star, Sidharth Malhotra has been named as New Zealand's tourism ambassador for India . The popular young actor will get his first taste of New Zealand next week before beginning his new
